properties.areaDesc: Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 10:08PM AKST until January 31 at 5:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches for
a total of 4 to 6 inches.

* WHERE...Juneau area with greatest amounts in the Mendenhall
Valley.

* WHEN...Until 5 AM AKST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Heavy wet snow will be difficult to manage.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A band of snow showers moved through
Thursday evening with 2 to 3 inches of accumulation in the
Mendenhall Valley. A similar band of snow is expected after 11
PM.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM AKST FRIDAY FOR THE MENDENHALL VALLEY
